appDesc.message: Automatically like YouTube videos from your favorite content creators.

appStoreDesc.message: Presses the like button so you don't have to! Features:  - Like videos instantly from subscribed channels, or like every video  - Be more selective: like after you've watched 2 minutes or 50% through  - Waits for ads to finish when using a timed option  - Won't override your choice if you've already disliked a video  - Lightweight: won't slow down your YouTube load time

reloadNotice.message: Reload the page to apply changes.
